column4: evening all - I am trying to change the default player of mp3s to xmms, but the OS won't let me, it won't let me change it anyone know why>
right click a file, then choose properties first, then click the open with tab and select the default
i just did it.  right click an mp3 file, choose properties, click the 'open with' tab, then choose xmms and close
Yeah, doesn't work... its locked on that one
